title: What are some ideas for a search engine? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s an interesting search engine Shmoogle.world . It’s interesting because it challenges the whole idea of ranking results, and presentes results in random order, so actually when results are presented in random order it makes you discover whole lotta surprising stuff you wouldn’t have seen normally on any other search engine

The trends is more about privacy now. Not sure that you can really improve the search result. Voice search can be an interesting domain. Another approach is to develop a niche search engine. Pinterest is a good example. You have collaborative project too like Yacy
